data.title: in Theatre is Columbus, Ohio's favorite drive
data.meta_description: The South Drive-in Theatre provides a unique and fun movie experience for all ages in Columbus, Ohio with concessions and new movies being played each week.
data.text:
HELP KEEP MAKING SOUTH DRIVE-IN GREAT! COVID-19 TOOK IT'S TOLL ON MOST SMALL BUSINESSES. HELP US STAY AROUND FOR YEARS TO COME, AND CONTINUE BRINGING YOU THE MOVIES UNDER THE STARS EXPERIENCE BY USING THE BUTTON BELOW TO DONATE.

E-GIFT CARDS AVAILABLE!

GET 25% OFF FOR LABOR DAY WITH PROMO CODE "LABOR2024" MIN LOAD $36! THIS IS ONLY FOR GIFT CARDS.

Theater Box Office E-Gift Card Link (Tickets & Admissions Only!)

Concessions E-Gift Card Link

SALE ENDS SEPT 9!

PLEASE CONSIDER SUPPORTING OUR SNACK BAR, INSTEAD OF BRINGING IN OUTSIDE FOOD & BEVERAGE! WE UNDERSTAND WE MAY NOT HAVE WHAT YOU WANT AND HOPE YOU WILL STILL BUY SOME POPCORN OR DRINKS FROM US. REMEMBER THEATERS SURVIVE ON THE CONCESSION SALES, NOT THE TICKET SALES. WE DO NOT WANT TO CHARGE FOR OUTSIDE FOOD & BEVERAGE BUT MAY BE FORCED TO AT SOME POINT.

WE'RE OPEN 7 NIGHTS A WEEK!

MOVIE SCHEDULE FOR FRI 8/9-THURS 8/15 ONLY!

GATE OPENS FRI/SAT 7:15 PM, SUN-THUR 8:00 PM.

SCREEN 1 91.9 FM

TWISTERS

RATED: PG13

MOVIE DETAILS

BUY TICKETS

STARTS @ 9:05 PM, REPLAYS @ 1:35 AM FRI/SAT ONLY

DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE

RATED: R

MOVIE DETAILS

BUY TICKETS

STARTS @ 11:22 PM

SCREEN 2 96.7 FM

BORDERLANDS

RATED: PG13

MOVIE DETAILS

THE STRANGERS: CHAPTER 1

RATED: R

MOVIE DETAILS

BUY TICKETS

STARTS @ 11:01 PM

CLICK BELOW TO PURCHASE ONLINE TICKETS:

YOU MUST SELECT THE FOLLOWING:

1) (CORRECT SIZE) CAR + DRIVER (SELECT ONLY 1).

2) # OF ADULT PASSENGERS AGES 12 & OVER (NOT INCLUDING THE DRIVER).

3) # CHILDREN AGES 5-11.

4) # OF KIDS AGE 4 & UNDER.

CAR AND OR PASSENGER TICKETS MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE AT THE GATE!

PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST!!!
